data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Sangvirotjanapat, Sunisa, Denduangboriphant, Jessada, Newman, Mark F. (2019): A taxonomic revision of Globba subsect. Nudae (Zingiberaceae). European Journal of Taxonomy 503: 1-37, DOI: 10.5852/ejt.2019.503|111 occurrences
